nodes.text: Squib Jedi was a children's holobook series, which was popular before the Rise of the Empire era. The story centered around a Squib Jedi. Rumors circulated that the main character of the series was based upon an existing Squib Jedi Knight with roguish qualities. Volume 3 of the series was entitled Busteromuchmacho and the Vermillion Shadow. Another volume was Busteromuchmacho and the Arc to Infinity. During his childhood, Halagad Ventor was a fan of that series.
A copy of Busteromuchmacho and the Vermillion Shadow was found in the possession of Squibs scavanging the ruins of Almas Academy after Order 66.
